titleStmt.title: A proclamation or edict Touching the opening and restoring of the traffique, and commerce of Spain, with these countries: although they haue seuered themselues from the obeisance of the illustrous arch-duke, as also vvith all vassals and subiects of princes and common-weales, being their friends, or neutrals. Faithfully translated out of the Nether-landish tongue according to printed copy. Imprinted at Brussels.
titleStmt.author: Netherlands. Sovereign (1598-1621 : Albert and Isabella)

publicationStmt.publisher: [By E. Allde] for Thomas Archer and are to be solde at the little shop by the Exchange,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
